definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

pinyin: Quan2 mian4 Jin4 zhi3 He2 shi4 yan4 Tiao2 yue1

sentences.english: China has all along supported and advocated complete prohibition and thorough destruction of nuclear weapons.
sentences.chinese: 中国一贯主张并积极倡导全面禁止和彻底销毁核武器。

sentences.english: The treaty has, for the first time, comprehensively prohibited a widely used conventional weapon.
sentences.chinese: 这是国际上第一次全面禁止一种广泛使用的常规武器。

sentences.english: China always advocates the comprehensive prohibition and thorough destruction of nuclear weapons.
sentences.chinese: 中国一贯主张全面禁止并彻底销毁核武器。

definition: to suppress/to crack down on/to prohibit
(of a power plant, refinery etc) to shut down
to issue/to proclaim/to enact (laws, decrees etc)
to strike a severe blow/to crack down/to take strong measures
to officially launch (a policy, program etc)/to appear on stage/to appear publicly/(of a bar girl) to leave with a client
